


<!-- @namespace    sugar.js.is -->
<!-- @name    isBoolean -->

# ```js isBoolean ```


Check if the passed value is a js Boolean

## Parameters

- **value**  Mixed: The value to check



## Example (js)

```js
import isBoolean from '@coffeekraken/sugar/js/is/boolean'
if (isBoolean(true) {
  // do something
}
```
